item.description:
Have you always wanted to see Aura's? In this class we will teach you techniques to do just that. Sign up for this fun, interactive class today!- In this class Lori will teach the participants techniques that will help them to be able to see Aura's.  She will have handouts for students to take with them to practice at home. Don't miss this opportunity to finally be able to see these visions. Insrtuctor Lori Otto will lead you through a meditation relaxing you and your eyesight and then assist you in noticing colors or shapes.

 

Leave the program knowing that you have enough tools to practice at home and show others your new fun skills.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Auras- How top Read Them!
